result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Operate w/o Valid License(2nd w/in3 Yrs)

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jonathon J. Nelson

records.addlTxt: rcv'd from Atty. Angela Komp  kmk

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: KPD15088855 Bench Warrant.

Attorney Jessica Krejcarek appeared for the State. Attorney A Komp appeared on behalf of deft, who did not appear. Clerk/H. Barnett. Atty Komp states she has been working on obtaining proof of deft's hospitalization. Court leaves message for deft's brother to provide documentation required. Court issues warrant $50,000 cash bond.

With Atty Komp and by agreement of ADA Krejcarek the FPT of 6/28/17 at 8:15am is adjourned, as Atty Komp is working on obtaining documentation that the deft is unable to appear in court due to his medical condition; reset to 9/20/17 at 8:45am.
At the request of Atty Komp, FPT on 5/16/17 at 1:30 is reset for 6/28/17 at 8:15, to allow her more time to obtain documentation re DE's mental and physical condition.

With Atty Komp and by approval of Judge Wagner the FPT of 2/23/17 at 8:45am is rescheduled; as deft is still in a nursing home in North Chicago, Atty Komp will try to obtain something from the deft's brother about his condition; reset to 5/16/17 at 1:30pm.
At the request of Atty Komp and by approval of Judge Wagner the FPT of 11/29/16 at 8:30am is rescheduled, as the deft is in the hospital; reset to 2/23/17 at 8:45am.
With Atty Komp and by agreement of ADA Krejcarek the FPT of 8/17/16 at 8:45am is rescheduled, as the deft is in the hospital; reset to 11/29/16 at 8:30am.

Attorney Rosa Delgado appeared for the State.  Atty Breckenfelder appeared for Angela Komp on behalf of the deft, who did not appear.  Clerk/S. Garcia.  Atty Breckenfelder states that the deft is in the hospital.  FPT reset to 8/17/16 @ 8:45.  Bond continued.
With Atty Komp and by agreement of ADA Delgado the FPT of 3/2/16 at 8:45am is rescheduled; as the deft is still in the hospital; reset to 6/15/16 at 8:30am.
Angela Komp  kmk
With Atty Komp the FPT of 1/19/16 at 1:15pm is rescheduled; as the deft is in the hospital; reset to 3/2/16 at 8:45am.
Per deft's brother Anthony, the deft is in the hospital in Milwaukee for medical treatment; Atty Komp was advised.
Petition and Order for Other Prosecution Costs rcv'd in the amount of $301.00  kmk

Attorney Carli McNeill appeared for the State.  Atty C Lassiter appeared on behalf of deft.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  Deft's appearance was excused.  Atty Lassiter states the deft is in the hospital and believes the earliest he may be released is 12/15/15.  Court removes case from trial calendar on 12/7/15.  STC set for 1/19/16 at 1:15pm.  Bond continued.
With Atty Ayers the JSH of 12/2/15 at 1:15pm is rescheduled, due to at trial proceeding in Br 6 on this date; reset to 12/3/15 at 3pm.

Atty Ayers reported that the deft is going to be in the hospital until 12/15/15, the deft's appearance is excused for 12/2/15 at 1:15pm and Atty Ayers can make a record on that date concerning the inability to proceed to trial on 12/7/15.
filed by ADA, Rosa Delgado  kmk
State's Notice Regarding Deft's Statements - filed by ADA, Rosa Delgado  kmk
State's Notice Regarding Deft's Criminal History - filed by ADA, Rose Delgado  kmk
State's List of Witnesses and Demand for Discovery - filed by ADA, Rosa Delgado  kmk

Attorney Rosa Delgado appeared for the State.  Def. appeared with Atty Carmen Lassiter.  Clerk K. Zirbel.  Case is not resolved.  Jury status hearing 12/2/15 at 1:15.  Jury selection 12/7/15 at 8:30.  Jury trial 12/8/15 at 9:00.  Bond continued.
No disposition. Leave on for next scheduled court activity.

Attorney Rosa Delgado appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person and w/ Attorney C Lassiter.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  Atty Lassiter states she has not received an offer yet.  DA PTC 9/18/15 at 1:30pm and FPT 10/7/15 at 1:15pm.  Bond continued.
No disposition. Leave on for next scheduled court activity.  kmk

records.descr: Application for specific judicial assign approved

records.addlTxt: of Br 3 filed by Atty Lassiter, tab pulled for Br 6.

Defendant, Jonathon J. Nelson, appeared with Attorney Carmen L. Lassiter.  Attorney Jessica Krejcarek appeared for the Prosecution.  Clerk: N. Jurgens. 
MINUTES: DE waives preliminary hearing; probable cause found. Substitution filed on Br 3, tab pulled for Br 6. Bound over to Br 6. Information filed with Ct 4 added, reading waived. Not guilty pleas entered. Bond continued.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 21, 2015 at 01:30 pm.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 28, 2015 at 08:15 am.
to Preliminary Hearing
filed by Atty. Carmen Lassiter  kmk
Carmen Lassiter  kmk
$250 posted 6/18/15.  kmk

1:24 pm    Special Prosecutor K. Richard Wells appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Matt Perz.  Clerk:  LE.    Defendant requests preliminary hearing within 20 days; set before Commissioner on 7-8-15 @ 8:45 am.  $250 cash bond set with conditions.

*Not To Possess or Consume Controlled Substances w/o a Prescription.
